attributes.action: Don’t let men have a 6 pm curfew
attributes.additional_details: I feel safe with my friends when we go out I only have friends that are male don’t. Not all men are the same obviously all women are going to be worried that’s normal but let men live their lives don’t take it away from them.
attributes.background: Don’t let innocent men suffer the men don’t rape women, rapists rape women. Don’t let every man suffer for a sick individuals behaviour.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government has not indicated that it is considering introducing a 6pm curfew for men. We're therefore not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.
